display_long_description:
# One of the Scariest Games in VR
 Prepare for heart-pounding horror as you face relentless waves of nightmarish creatures. Experience the chilling atmosphere, brutal enemies, and limited resources that make every encounter a tense fight for survival.
[media]
# Intuitive Controls, Instant Action
 With easy-to-learn controls, you can jump right into the action and share the experience with friends and family. The intuitive setup makes this shooter accessible to everyone, while still delivering intense challenges.
[media]
# A Perfect Jump-In VR Shooter and Horror Experience
 Whether playing solo or sharing the headset with others, The Brookhaven Experiment delivers a thrilling experience perfect for parties and gatherings. See how long everyone can last against the terrifying hordes.
[media]
# Fight for Humanity’s Survival
 The world is collapsing, and you're the last line of defense. Use a powerful arsenal, upgrade your weapons, and battle through waves of terrifying creatures. Every bullet counts in this epic fight to save the world from chaos.
[media]
# Press
"The Brookhaven Experiment builds on the foundation of its popular demo and establishes itself as on one the premiere VR zombie shooter experiences"
-- Upload VR

"I liked how unsettling this game feels overall. It's genuinely terrifying"
-- ABC
